product_overview: JARVIS AI Assistant is an advanced AI-powered personal assistant integrating multi-modal biometrics, autonomous task management, and immersive 3D and VR interfaces to enhance productivity, security, and user experience in personal and professional environments.
core_goals: Provide secure and seamless biometric authentication using face and voice recognition with liveness detection.
Leverage multiple large language models for advanced reasoning, planning, code generation, and conversation.
Offer personalized, AI-driven task management and predictive productivity recommendations.
Enable autonomous system evolution through self-refactoring, optimization, and rollback.
Deliver immersive user experience via 3D cinematic HUD and VR workspace.
Automate desktop, browser, cloud, and smart home operations with remote control and monitoring.
Securely manage personal, family, and learning memories with encrypted storage and playback.
key_features: Multi-LLM AI Brain integrating multiple large language models for versatile AI capabilities.
Face & Voice Authentication with biometric and liveness detection for enhanced security.
Memory Vault for secure, encrypted storage and playback of personal and family memories.
Stealth Modes to bypass proctoring and provide exam, interview, and passive copilot functionalities with anti-detection overlays.
System Automation for desktop, browser, and cloud operations including AWS integrations.
Copy Engine enabling secure cloning, licensing, and master control of AI copies.
Autonomous Evolution with AI-driven code refactoring, optimization, and rollback capabilities.
Predictive Task Management featuring AI-driven task prioritization, analytics, and productivity recommendations.
AI Content Creation Suite supporting multi-format content generation for blogs, emails, and reports.
Advanced Learning Suite delivering personalized learning paths and skill analytics.
Environmental & Health Suite providing real-time monitoring, reminders, and analytics for health and environment.
Real-time Monitoring & Analytics of system metrics, performance alerts, and user activity.
3D Cinematic HUD with futuristic holographic interface and animations.
Smart Home Integration allowing device control, automation rules, and remote access.
VR Workspace offering virtual reality panels and immersive interaction environment.
user_flow_summary: User launches the application and completes biometric authentication via face and voice recognition with liveness detection.
User accesses AI Brain functionalities to interact with multi-LLMs for conversation, planning, and code generation.
User manages tasks through predictive task management dashboard with AI-prioritized workflows and analytics.
User stores and retrieves memories securely in the Memory Vault component with encrypted playback.
User activates Stealth Modes as needed for exams, interviews, or passive copilot usage with respective overlays.
User configures and operates system automation workflows for desktop, browser, cloud, and smart home devices.
User utilizes AI Content Creation Suite for generating multi-format content efficiently.
User monitors system status and health via real-time monitoring and Environmental & Health Suites.
User interacts with 3D Cinematic HUD and optionally switches to VR Workspace for immersive experience.
validation_criteria: Successful biometric authentication with high accuracy and liveness detection under varying conditions.
Seamless integration and performance of multiple large language models for AI reasoning and generation tasks.
Reliable encrypted storage and secure access to Memory Vault data.
Effectiveness of Stealth Modes in preventing detection during exams and interviews without impacting legitimate use.
Automation workflows execute correctly across desktop, browser, cloud, and smart home devices with user-configured rules.
Copy Engine enforces licensing and master control policies preventing unauthorized AI copy usage.
Autonomous Evolution performs code refactoring and rollback without introducing system instability.
Predictive Task Management improves user productivity metrics based on AI prioritization and recommendations.
User content creation outputs are accurate, relevant, and generated efficiently in various formats.
Accurate real-time monitoring and alerting for system and health/environment metrics allowing timely user interventions.
Immersive 3D HUD and VR Workspace render smoothly with interactive controls and animations.
